title: Rasen Mechanic with Rasen Mechanic with Rasen Mechanic WITH RASEN MECHANIC

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Short circuit a player each night. (*Short circuited players' attributes are nullified until the end of the night.*)
- **Timewarp** {during the day}. (*Choose a previous night's actions and rewrite their targets. Everything is reprocessed from that point, so players who were rewritten to die have their later actions undone, but new feedback isn't given. Timewarping resolves {at day end and is announced. You may only timewarp once}.*)
- **Cleave** during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: *Overloaded* â€” You may {not} have your ability target every player in the game.
